passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > header:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(5) > ul:nth-child(1) > li:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
